pages.text: The AR Goggles can be used in combination with the $(9)$(l:peripherals/ar_controller)AR Controller$(/l)$() to have a customizable overlay wherever you go. Fun!$(p)Right click an AR Controller with your glasses to link them.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/items/ar_goggles/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!
